extendedInfo.description: ------------------------------------------UPDATE FACEBOOK AND TWITTER SIMULTANEOUSLY------------------------------------------Do you use Facebook and Twitter and tired to post the same message, photo or video on each site separately? Or ever wondered how to share one of my SMS on Facebook wall and Twitter?Droid2Wall is the best application to update Facebook & Twitter simultaneously and very quickly, when it comes to Status updates, Posting SMS from your phone, Pictures and Videos (Videos feature coming soon)--------------------FEATURES--------------------â Post and share SMS from your phone to Facebook and Twitter: Ever wondered how to share and post a nice quote, a joke or a greeting SMS that you received, with friends and family on Facebook and Twitter. With Droid2Wall you can do that easily. Simply choose the SMS to share and there you go. â Update Status on Facebook and Twitter in one go:No need to update your Facebook wall and tweet the same thing. With Droid2Wall you can update both with a single tap.â Picture Posting on Facebook and Twitter:Post pictures simultaneously on both Facebook and Twitter (via twitpic). Either choose from the gallery or take a photo on the spot and share on both social networksâ Video UploadingUploading videos simultaneously to both Facebook with friends and Twitter for people following you. Either upload from the video gallery in your phone or capture the memories while on the go and share. Currently, only 5Mb video can be uploaded.--------------------BEAUTIFUL WIDGET--------------------You have the facility to use the beautiful Droid2Wall widget to access all the features with just a click--------------------SUPPORT--------------------Please contact our support team for suggestions, feedback and for any issue you encounter. We are here to help.Contact us on: droid2wall@drizzleapps.com--------------------Keywords: post sms to Facebook, tweet sms, post sms to twitter, share sms on facebook and twitter, tweet pictures, upload videos and pictures to Facebook

reviews.title: Error on logging in
reviews.comment: I tried to log in again, there\'s an error.
reviews.author: Tristan Abantao

reviews.title: Wtf u kidding me?
reviews.comment: I cant log in always error. Pls fix. Geez what a crappy app
reviews.author: Glenn Rivera

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: Connects to facebook fine but wont let me authorize the twitter app on my s2. Tried clicking the link as it wasnt redirecting me back to the app but . . . Nothing. Swiftly deleted as there are now other apps out there like this that actually work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
reviews.comment: Upgraded to a new phone recently and the old app that came with my old phone was no longer there...looked EVERYWHERE for something so simple, and finally found it with this. Just what I wanted, something that will update both with one click and has a widget to go along with it for easy access~ The only thing I miss about my old one is the character counter, since Twitter messages have that limit! Thanks a bunch!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok. But needs a few more features.
reviews.comment: I found this to be a great app. I wish it has a couple more features: a character counter and a automatic status shortener for twitter (like twitlonger).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Suleman
reviews.comment: Really handy, if u are freak of sharing instantly your updates. Its indeed a great application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy ...
reviews.comment: Updating quickly without downloading all the updates from others. Very efficient for quick updating Facebook and Twitter with the same material ... Thumbs up ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Now i dont need to keep both facebook and twitter app for sharing pics. I can do it only with droid2wall..great work..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: awaesome
reviews.comment: great application..easy to use..now i can share my text messages on facebook and twitter and that to simultaneously.Another great thing about the app is that not only can you share picture from the gallery but you can take a pic and share it instantly without going to the gallery and searching for it.I hope they bring the video sharing feature soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gr8 app
reviews.comment: Realy a nice app for a quick share
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good software! very well done...... Excellent!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Wont let me log in on fb pls fix it
